item.description:
We are getting down to the wire for the Oyster Festival. There is quite a bit of information to share. This is a great opportunity to meet each other as well.

Agenda in order:

1. Talking points & roll play
2. Festival booth rules
3. setup/breakdown- when and who
4. transportation to event
5. tickets will be handed out

With volunteers attending from all points, the meeting will be held at Panera Bread in the Milford Mall. You see it from the main entrance on the Post Road side of the mall.

If it is nice weather wise, we'll be outside on the patio.

It is really important that all volunteers attend.
R.S.V.P. by Tuesday noon please.

Thanks for being an outreach volunteer!

barbara g.
item.name: Oyster Festival Volunteer Meeting
